scripts.lint: phpcs -s --extensions=php src/ tests/ && yarn global add markdownlint-cli && markdownlint . --ignore vendor/
scripts.lint-fix: phpcbf --extensions=php src/ tests/ && yarn global add markdownlint-cli && markdownlint . --fix --ignore vendor/
scripts.test-coverage: phpunit --coverage-clover coverage/clover.xml --coverage-html coverage/html --coverage-text --log-junit coverage/junit.xml tests/ && coverage-check coverage/clover.xml 100
